description.zh: Papercups 是一个使用 Elixir 构建的开源实时客户支持 Web 应用程序。它为企业提供了一个自托管的客户支持工具，替代 Zendesk 和 Intercom 等第三方服务，使企业能够完全掌控客户数据。平台包含可自定义的聊天小部件，支持与 Slack 和 Mattermost 集成，并可在 React、React Native 和 Flutter 应用中嵌入。
description.en: Papercups is an open source live customer support web application built with Elixir. It provides businesses with a self-hosted alternative to third-party customer support tools like Zendesk and Intercom, allowing them to maintain full control over customer data. The platform includes a customizable chat widget, integrations with Slack and Mattermost, and support for embedding in React, React Native, and Flutter apps.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 提供自托管、注重隐私的第三方客户支持工具替代方案
- 完全开源，社区驱动，拥有活跃的贡献者
- 基于 Elixir 构建，具备高性能、容错能力和实时功能

## 功能列表:

- 支持通过电子邮件回复
- 支持通过短信（SMS）回复
- 可定制的聊天小部件
- 支持在 React 中嵌入
- 支持在 React Native 中嵌入
- 支持在 Flutter 应用中嵌入
- 支持与 Slack 集成
- 支持与 Mattermost 集成
- 支持 Markdown 和表情符号
- 团队邀请系统
- 对话管理功能（关闭、分配、优先级排序）
- 支持实时更新
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Offers a self-hosted, privacy-focused alternative to third-party customer support tools
- Fully open source and community-driven with active contributions
- Built on Elixir for high performance, fault tolerance, and real-time capabilities

## Features:

- Reply from email
- Reply from SMS
- Customizable chat widget
- React support
- React Native support
- Flutter support
- Slack integration
- Mattermost integration
- Markdown and emoji support
- Team invitation system
- Conversation management (close, assign, prioritize)
- Realtime updates support
